table.caption: Cloud Giant Wealth
rows: A cloud giant seeks to gain wealth by investing in an adventuring party (perhaps giving the characters magic items or other valuables) in exchange for a share of the party's rewards.
A cloud giant hosts an art gala in a cloud castle to display their wealth, providing an opportunity for the characters to retrieve an important magic item from the giant's collection.
Wishing to one-up rivals, a cloud giant seeks adventurers to hunt exotic monsters for a lavish banquet.

With two nations on the brink of war, the characters discover cloud giants are betting on the outcomeâ€”and at least one giant is meddling behind the scenes to increase the likelihood of one side winning.
A cloud giant who recently lost a large amount of money on bad bets tries to recoup those losses by plundering a royal treasury or the adventurers' stronghold.
A cloud giant offers to buy the adventurers' services as an extravagant (and useful) gift for another giant.
